REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0823 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-SUR 03-25 0047

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET SURPLUS REVISED TO 250 MLN STG
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it revised up its forecast of today's surplus in the money markets to 250 mln stg from its earlier estimate of a 150 mln. The central bank has not operated in the market today. REUTER
